M - I normally like Tim Burton's movies but there is several factors why this doesn't work. One being that it is back and white all the way true.
I have no problem with B&W movies but here it has no purpose or any esthetical gainings. It just becomes very annoying especially as Tim doesn't seem to have any experience working with B&W film. You cant just desaturated the color you need spend extra attention to contrast between objects otherwise it becomes very tiring to watch.

Any what. You fucked up on this one Mr. Burton but thanks for the upload anyhow!
